oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Honorable discharge papers of Sgt. B. F. Collinsworth
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sgt. B. F. Collinsworth, Co. E, 1st Regt. Ky. Vol. Inf., CSA, from Gibson Co., Tenn., enlisted on April 23, 1861. The discharge described him as a student, 5 feet 6 inches tall with a fair complexion, blue eyes and dark hair. The reverse side noted that he was to be provided transportation to Humboldt, Tenn.
